titleStmt.title: A very short and pithie catechisme verie profitable for all that will come prepared to the Supper of the Lord: VVith a forme of confessyon, prayer and thanks giuing, very necessary and comfortable for all christian families. Made by Bartimeus Andrewes, preacher of the word of God at great Yarmouth: published at the request of the vvorshipfull and godlie magistrates there.
titleStmt.author: Andrewes, Bartimaeus.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
